text:
@kylegriffin1 This is why @realDonaldTrump LIED about the threat of coronavirus for so long, and continues to LIE. Selfishness.

The myth that he cares about American citizens is another big pinocchio. He @IvankaTrump @FLOTUS @DonaldJTrumpJr @EricTrump care only about the trump brand. Period.
